content.heading: Building an AI Video Platform
content.body_text: Hey everyone! Today I'm showing you how I built an AI-powered video generation platform using Remotion, OpenAI, and Google Gemini.

content.heading: The Architecture
content.body_text: The platform takes a JSON brief and generates everything automatically - images, voiceover, captions, and the final video.

content.heading: Character Consistency
content.body_text: The coolest feature is Nano Banana - Google's image model that keeps characters consistent across every scene. Like me!

content.heading: AI Voice Cloning
content.body_text: We use IndexTTS-2 for voice cloning and OpenAI Whisper for word-level timestamps. Every word syncs perfectly with captions.

content.heading: Try It Yourself!
content.body_text: The whole thing is open source. Clone the repo, add your API keys, and start generating videos. Link in the description!
